full_summary:
=====================================

### Tender Cancellation Notice

#### Official Tender Number: PW-22-01011007

Notice of cancellation has been issued for the **Competitive Request for Proposal (SRV)**, previously referenced as **2022COE002**. Due to unforeseen circumstances, all interested parties are hereby notified that this tender is cancelled, and the associated requirements will be re-issued at a later date.

#### Important Details
----------------------

*   **Government of Canada Contracting Entity:** Parks Canada
*   **Location:** Ontario (except National Capital Region)
*   **Sector:** Agriculture Research and Development (G-SIN: AA910300, CFTA Agreement)
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   Laird Munro, Contracting Authority
    *   Phone: 403-605-9739
    *   Email: [laird.munro@pc.gc.ca](mailto:laird.munro@pc.gc.ca)

#### Closing and Performance Details
---------------------------------------

*   **Tender Cancellation Date:** October 25, 2022
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not applicable (Postponed)
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** Not applicable (Postponed)

Note: All information related to this cancelled tender may be subject to verification upon re-release. Interested parties should consult the official government procurement website for more information about this tender, when it is re-issued.
